name: 2S1E (2Sides, One Ending)
description:
2S1E is a BenBonk 3 Jam Submission Made By ImZary, & it is about you & your clone, trying to finish the level as fast as possible, before you die cause of lava, Hope you like it :D

CONTROLS (please don't skip this part, it is important) : 

L : to switch players.

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Space to jump.

& that's it!, Cya :D
